name: Amirreza Alasti
headline: AI Researcher | Master Student in Artificial Intelligence @ Leibniz University Hannover | Full Stack Developer
about: With a strong foundation in Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Embedded Systems, Reinforcement Learning, and Data Mining, I transitioned my focus last year to a new trajectory as an Artificial Intelligence Engineer and Data Scientist. This shift was inspired by my participation in courses covering Data Science and Machine Learning. The multidisciplinary nature of these fields continues to captivate my interest, driving my pursuit of excellence in the realms of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Working as a Data Scientist intern, applying advanced machine learning techniques to real-world data challenges in the hearing care industry.

experience.title: Student Assistant
experience.description: Studentische Hilfskraft bei IDaS – Data Science and Digital Libraries. Key contributions include developing the 'TIB AIssistant', an AI-powered assistant for researchers, and leading the development of 'EmpiRE Compass', an Open Source Research Impact Dashboard. I also contributed to 'OntoAligner', an ontology alignment library, and implemented the 'LLM4Synthesis' project codebase.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Mentored over 100 students in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Analysis, and Software Engineering. I led interactive workshops, trained students in end-to-end project development, and organized comprehensive exams to assess their progress.

experience.title: Software & AI Engineer
experience.description: Developed 'IMap', an AI-driven optimization system which was also my Bachelor's thesis subject. Implemented shelf object detection systems, built a PWA POS system, and enhanced existing ERP systems. I also played a key role in mentoring interns and facilitating university-company collaborations.

education.description: Specializing in Artificial Intelligence. Active in research projects involving Computer Vision and Medical Applications.
Focused on Software Engineering and AI. Thesis: IMap - AI-driven optimization system.

education.degree: Associate Degree, Electrical/Electronics Maintenance and Repair Technology

awards.title: Deutschlandstipendium
awards.description: Awarded the Deutschlandstipendium scholarship for outstanding academic achievement and social commitment.

volunteering.organization: International Conference on Computer and Knowledge Engineering (ICCKE)
volunteering.description: Held on Ferdowsi University of Mashhad.
Volunteered at WeAreDevelopers World Congress, assisting with event organization and attendee support.
